question: A population of 1000 individuals has 490 individuals with the genotype AA, 420 with the genotype Aa, and 90 with the genotype aa. Calculate the frequencies of the A and a alleles in this population.

sample_answer.full_answer:
The frequency of the A allele is (2 * 490 + 420) / (2 * 1000) = 0.7 (2 marks).
The frequency of the a allele is (2 * 90 + 420) / (2 * 1000) = 0.3 (2 marks).

marking_criteria.criteria: Correctly calculates the frequency of the A allele.
Correctly calculates the frequency of the a allele.
